column4: i need help.... my pc is freezing. Id just re-install ubuntu and no luck :/
define "freezing"
stop working... like an screen shoot
check what process is occupying your cpu
let me check.. its a 6 core pc with 16 gbs of ram and 60 gbs ssd sata 3 disk
just a Q - are you getting DDoS ?
don't think so.. cause it do it eaven disconnected
does this happen right after reboot or ?
ramdom.... something screen looks wierd like if where something with the video
compiz and gnome-system-monitor have about 6% of cpu both...everything else is on 0
i use ubuntu for day by day use... check mails, web, and chat.... and an xp (extra disk) for gamming
1. disable compiz and check if u have the same issue
i'm new in ubuntu (running out of windows jejej) ... how to disable compiz? ... and the memory check i think i can do it with the live disk rigth ?
grub menu should have memtest option
[deXter]  .... what about video drivers? ... board has an integrated ati hd 4250 and ubuntu use proprietary drivers that i had to activate
did you install ati drivers ?
yes i did..... in the terminal with the sudo apt-get install flgrx something and catalyst something
Im talking about official drivers, not fglrx
[deXter]   help me out to roll back and install default... because without do that command i can't use extended desktop with my tv .
